arts.ttl: Arsenal Transfer News: David Ornstein confirms 'very advanced' Martin Zubimendi signing
arts.sum: Arsenal's talks with Real Sociedad for Martin Zubimendi are 'very advanced,' according to David Ornstein. One of them is the signing of striker target Benjamin Sesko, who already bought into Arsenal's project last year, the other is Martin Zubimendi.
